title: Things We Lost In The Fire
content:
So you may have noticed that we’ve had a nifty little redesign with the site, that went live last night.

Whilst there’s still a few bits and pieces to sort out (images not loading correctly, player occasionally malfunctioning), we believe it’s a big step forward for the Crack in the Road. Feel free to head to the frontpage and have a little look around, we’d love some feedback, either over on Facebook or Twitter.

Anyway, in the reshuffle, we lost several posts, as well as much of yesterday, so we’re playing catch-up a little. With that in mind here’s a bunch of tracks, some reposts, that we think are essential listening.
